product_name: The North Face Apex Bionic Vest - Men's
long_description: The North Face Apex Bionic vest offers durable windproof protection for your core. Offering solid performance, Apex ClimateBlock stretch laminated fleece is windproof, ultra water resistant and breathable; fleece backer enhances moisture wicking and warmth. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Windflap backs front zipper, and chin guard protects against zipper abrasion. Drawcord hem cinches to hold in warmth. The North Face Apex Bionic vest features 2 zippered hand pockets and a Napoleon chest pocket. Standard fit allows some layers underneath.
short_description: The North Face Apex Bionic vest offers durable windproof protection for your core.
